game.name: Super Glitter Rush
game.desc:
30 cute and unique bosses are waiting for you in a colorful world of pixel art. But don't let your guard down just because they're cute! These bosses shoot lots of bullets!
The hail of bullets might look hard. But don't worry. With special bullets that catch your opponent's bullets, you can shoot them all back! The more you catch, the stronger you get!
